messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/20/02 8:08:37 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Our across the street neighbors, our next door neighbors and I went in together to buy a steam
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/20/02 8:08:37 PM Central Daylight Time,
freeform@... writes:


> On Thu, 20 Jun 2002 18:22:12 EDT SandraDodd@... writes:
>
> > But mostly, I stall. I hate to clean. And I wish I had a steam
> > carpet
> > cleaner like the ones they rent, but they cost $800 so I don't have
> > one.
>
> I got one for $125 or so, on sale at Target from somewhere under $200. It
> looks like a vacuum cleaner, that style, but it's a steam cleaner.
> Worked great, I was always amazed at how much dirt was in the crpets.
>

Our across the street neighbors, our next door neighbors and I went in
together to buy a steam cleaner. We love it!

~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
